body: I realized that I was using tf.train.shuffle_batch() for both my train and validation datasets, so I switched to using tf.train.batch() for validation. Because the number of examples is not an exact multiple of the batch size, the final batch will have some examples that have already been processed. I keep a set of example IDs that I have already labeled in order to discard duplicates.
title: Best way to read data exactly once in tensorflow?
